qas.question: What does Dell aim to reduce by creating energy efficient products?
How much does energy efficiency save Dell per year?
What is the largest contributor to Dell's energy efficiency savings?
How many PCs does Dell employ energy management software on?
What does Dell aim to increase by creating energy efficient products?
What doesn't Dell aim to reduce by creating energy efficient products?
How much does energy efficiency save Dell per month?
What is the smallest contributor to Dell's energy efficiency savings?
How many PCs does Dell employ energy management hardware on?

context: The company aims to reduce its <a0_0><b4_0><b5_0>external environmental impact<b5_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/> through energy-efficient evolution of products, and also reduce its direct operational impact through energy-efficiency programs. Internal energy-efficiency programs reportedly save the company more than <a1_0><b6_0>$3 million<b6_0/><a1_0/> annually in energy-cost savings. The largest component of the company's internal energy-efficiency savings comes through <a2_0><b7_0>PC power management<b7_0/><a2_0/>: the company expects to save $1.8 million in energy costs through using specialized energy-management software on a network of <a3_0><b8_0>50,000<b8_0/><a3_0/> PCs.
